branchCategory.name: 2 Port Solenoid Valve, Energy Saving Type
branchCategory.description: <p>SMC has developed the VXE series energy saving type, 2 port solenoid valve to help with environmental issues. The PWM (Pulse Width Modulation) method was used to allow for less power consumption. By reducing the energy consumption we have also reduced the heat produced by the coil. This series is available in three styles: VXE directed operated, VXED pilot operated, and VXEZ zero differential pressure type pilot operated. These valves are normally closed, 12 or 24VDC and are available for air, water, or oil applications.</p>

breadCrumb.name: 2 Port Solenoid Valve, Energy Saving Type

branchItem.name: VXE, Energy Saving Type, 2 Port Solenoid Valve (Single Unit)
branchItem.bullets: <UL><LI>Power saving circuit to reduce power consumption by 1/3 during holding operation <LI>Power consumption: 1.5W (size 1), 2.3W (size 2), 3W (size 3) <LI>Body material: brass (C37), stainless steel <LI>Seal material available: NBR, FKM, EPDM, PTFE <LI>Rated voltage: 24VDC, 12VDC</LI></UL>

branchItem.name: VXE, Energy Saving Type, 2 Port Solenoid Valve for Manifold
branchItem.bullets: <UL><LI>Power saving circuit to reduce power consumption by 1/3 during holding operation <LI>Power consumption: 1.5W (size 1), 2.3W (size 2), 3W (size 3) <LI>Common port size: 3/8 inch <LI>Seal material available: NBR, FKM <LI>Rated voltage: 24VDC, 12VDC</LI></UL>
